para.text: Start a new MODFLOW model and select "Days" as the time unit.

image.title: Screen capture of the Startup dialog box showing selection of "Days" as the model time units.
image.caption: Screen capture of the Startup dialog box showing selection of "Days" as the model time units.

para.text: The model has 46 columns, 31 rows, and 1 layer. The top of the model has an elevation of 10 and the bottom elevation is zero. The grid cell size is 10.

image.title: Screen capture of the initial grid dialog box illustrating the initial grid setup.
image.caption: Screen capture of the initial grid dialog box illustrating the initial grid setup.
